resources.string: Morrigan strides into the tavern, an aura of icy power clinging to her, frost crackling at her fingertips and a determined glint in her piercing blue eyes. \n\n"I\'ll take a chilled mug of spiced cider, but please, add a hint of frost, if you can manage. Today, I've been wrapped in a wintry veil of spells, a cold drink might just balance it out."

string-array.name: player_morrigan
string-array.item: I hope the cold touch of your drink helps thaw the wintry veil you\'ve woven today.
Well, watch out for frost in your cider. Might add an extra chill to your already frosty day.
You\'ve mastered the art of balancing wintry spells; maybe I could bring a little warmth to your evening?
